ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound russet potatoes, cut into 1-inch cubes

cookingTips: Cut potatoes into uniform 1-inch pieces so they cook evenly
Toss potatoes halfway through cooking to ensure even browning on all sides
Don't skip the oil; it's essential for creating crispy, golden exteriors
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Show me how to cut potatoes uniformly, season them properly, and air fry while shaking the basket for evenly crispy, golden breakfast potatoes.
